subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Bowing out of the Peyton Manning sweepstakes, the Jets agreed in principle with Mark Sanchez on a new five-year contract that could be worth as much as $68.5 million.
snippet: Bowing out of the Peyton Manning sweepstakes, the Jets agreed in principle with Mark Sanchez on a new five-year contract that could be worth as much as $68.5 million.
